A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made an account just to write a review of this movie. Best star wars movie\, period. I don't get why people dislike it so much\, character arcs made sense\, the plot was alright\, and I feel like they did almost everything right. You expect one thing and then BAM\, NOPE. Awesome movie\, old star wars fans will never be appeased no matter what. Nostalgia makes everything infinitely better\, you wanted a star wars movie\, this is what you got. Best use of my money in a very long time\, absolutely worth the watch
